GoalDesc: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
TargetDesc: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities
IndicatorDesc: CO2 emission per unit of value added
SeriesDesc: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
Source: IEA CO2 Emissions from Fuel Combustion Statistics 2017.
